metadata.title: CVE-2019-16239 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
process_http_response in OpenConnect before 8.05 has a Buffer Overflow whena malicious server uses HTTP chunked encoding with crafted chunk sizes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16239` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenconnect5 - 8.05-1
openconnect - 8.05-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openconnect package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.05-1').
